Body: Here I am back after three days in London, especially to represent Non-Zero at the Â« Finance Magnates London Summit Â».  I did not expect so many brokers FX and CFD would welcome the offer of Non-Zero as well, that's great news because the most important in the project Non-Zero is the adoption of brokers!  So, since the crypto markets are falling (about 15% for now) and I think it will continue until the end of the year. I sold all my ETH, XRP and BTC (not a big amount but still) to buy NZO Token (right now with a 25% bonus that will offset the recent decline of the market).  Since I think the crypto will go down again, at least until the end of the year, this allocation allows me to lock the value of my crypto investments for a few months (until the ICO).  *** This is NOT purchase recommendations here, it's just my VERY PERSONAL opinion and it is sharing my Crypto Portfolio as I did often during a dedicated webinar (in French) ***

Author: marcraffard
Title: [ANN] ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ NONZERO - Breaking The Zero-Sum Bias! ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥
Body: The reason why we are creating this project is to implement more fairness into the FX and CFD Brokerage Industry... to the benefit of retail traders. On another hand, Brokers are suffering from the new restrictive regulation, have acquisition and retention client cost jumping and Non-Zero is offering to them a solution to their problems.  The Token sales with 25% will end this month, after that.. it will be 10% bonus. The token sales will run until end of March but there are chances to be ended end of December or January if the 99 millions of NZO tokens are sold !
